Pre-Game Insights: An Indian team with a new captain and a new coach looking to chart their roadmap for the T20 World Cup 2026 to be held on home soil.
An exciting new journey ahead for Suryakumar Yadav and the team in the shortest format as they seek to continue the winning habit against the Lankans in the three-match series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India will be looking to continue their winning habit against Sri Lanka in the three-match series.
Sri Lanka will look to make amends for their dismal show in the recently concluded T20 World Cup.
Others: The Indian team will be led by Suryakumar Yadav and coached by Gautam Gambhir.
The Sri Lankan team will be led by Charith Asalanka.
Hardik Pandya is back against an opposition he loves!
